title: News this week: Start your Monday smart
text:
If your day doesn't start until you've gotten up to speed on the latest headlines, then let us introduce you to your new favorite morning fix. Sign up here for the '5 Things' newsletter.

Get '5 things' in your inbox

(CNN) Here's what you need to know to Start Your Week Smart .

(You can also get "5 Things You Need to Know Today" delivered to your inbox daily. You give us five minutes, and we give you five things you must know for your weekday, plus a Sunday edition to get your week started smart. Sign up here .)

TODAY

Will "Game of Thrones" rule, or could the "Bodyguard," "Better Call Saul" or "Killing Eve" thwart its dominance? Review nominees in major categories, then tune in at 8 p.m. ET on Fox

'Game of Thrones' leading the way in Emmy nominations

'Game of Thrones' leading the way in Emmy nominations 02:40

'Game of Thrones' leading the way in Emmy nominations

Ken Burns' new epic, "Country Music," traces the American mainstay from its birth in the 1920s. The latest installments of the eight-part, 16-hour series air nightly throughat 8 ET on PBS

Nashville is the hot new place for bachelorette parties

Nashville is the hot new place for bachelorette parties 03:24

Nashville is the hot new place for bachelorette parties

JUST WATCHED Rugby players advised to cover tattoos in Japan Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Rugby players advised to cover tattoos in Japan 01:28

MONDAY

JUST WATCHED On GPS: Are Saudi Arabia and Iran on the brink of war? Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH On GPS: Are Saudi Arabia and Iran on the brink of war? 01:30

JUST WATCHED Police officer indicted in Botham Jean's death Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Police officer indicted in Botham Jean's death 03:01

• Happy birthday to The Boss. turns 70. Bruce Springsteen turns 70.

JUST WATCHED How Springsteen OK'd 'Blinded By The Light' Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH How Springsteen OK'd 'Blinded By The Light' 03:02

TUESDAY

• NTSB reviews fatal Massachusetts fires. A year after a A year after a series of fires and explosions rocked cities north of Boston, the National Transportation Safety Board is due to meet to determine what caused the blasts. A teenager was killed and others were hurt when more than 60 suspected gas fires broke out, forcing thousands to evacuate.

JUST WATCHED Several suspected gas explosions caused fires in Massachusetts Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Several suspected gas explosions caused fires in Massachusetts 00:53

• 1st US cannabis café opens. You've heard of wine pairings; how about weed pairings? Lowell Café You've heard of wine pairings; how about weed pairings? Lowell Café is set to open near Los Angeles, aiming to reduce the stigma around marijuana

JUST WATCHED Possible cannabis plants found at state Capitol building Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Possible cannabis plants found at state Capitol building 00:52

• 1st down, Congress! This is no sports metaphor. Lawmakers from both sides of the aisle team up with ex-NFL players to face off against the US Capitol Police in the 10th annual This is no sports metaphor. Lawmakers from both sides of the aisle team up with ex-NFL players to face off against the US Capitol Police in the 10th annual charity football game

JUST WATCHED Sights and sounds from the congressional game Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Sights and sounds from the congressional game 01:22

WEDNESDAY

JUST WATCHED Beto O'Rourke: We should stop selling weapons of war Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Beto O'Rourke: We should stop selling weapons of war 01:52

THURSDAY

JUST WATCHED Cooper breaks down whistleblower complaint revelations Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Cooper breaks down whistleblower complaint revelations 04:26

• Beatles' 'Abbey Road' marks 50 years. The last album recorded by the Fab Four The last album recorded by the Fab Four was released a half-century ago. Fans last month flocked to the London street crossing featured on the record's cover.

JUST WATCHED 50th anniversary edition of 'Abbey Road' Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH 50th anniversary edition of 'Abbey Road' 01:29

FRIDAY

• Racing returns to beleaguered Santa Anita. The autumn meet The autumn meet is scheduled to open at the California race course where 31 horses have died since December. Investigations are underway and stricter rules have been implemented following the deaths.

JUST WATCHED Horse trainers and track investigated after Santa Anita deaths Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Horse trainers and track investigated after Santa Anita deaths 08:48

SATURDAY

• A memorial service honors a teen killed in a brawl. Mourners are due to gather to honor Khaseen Morris, the 16-year-old student who was Mourners are due to gather to honor Khaseen Morris, the 16-year-old student who was attacked and killed in New York as a group of teens looked on, some recording the assault on their phones but none stepping in to help.

JUST WATCHED Teen fatally stabbed while onlookers took video Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Teen fatally stabbed while onlookers took video 01:16
description: Emmy Awards. Whistleblower saga. UN General Assembly. Ex-Dallas officer trial. 'SNL.' Autumn. 'Abbey Road.' Santa Anita. Here's what the next six days will bring.
